author: Anthony Dunk
comment: The needle always point north, so it works on Sony Smartwatch 3. However, the fixed N/S/E/W bezel just serves to confuse. When I'm facing east the needle points to "W". Why not make the whole thing rotate? The way it is, you always have to rotate your wrist so that the arrow points to "N" first and then read of the compass directions from the bezel.
title: Works ok but is a bit counter-intuitive

author: Martin Leech
comment: It's amazing how many people don't read the description of the app they are downloading, especially Moto 360 users. It states it works with square watches and they still get it then one star review because it doesn't work.
title: Working well

author: John Michaels
comment: Even though it does say in the description that it's only compatible with square devices, I find that unacceptable when the UI is round anyway and Google provides all the tools necessary to maintain compatibility with both rectangular and round devices.
title: Doesn't work with round devices

author: Dayne Putnam
comment: The app crashes on the moto 360. I will update my review at a later date if this supports the 360
title: Moto 360 crashing

author: Ryan Rogers
comment: As another review said,  NW shows NE and so on. Thanks for the effort. Will re-download once fixed.
title: Not calibrated correctly.

author: DraG HunT
comment: The compass after opening stares at a random position and locks it....  I. E. I an looking north but the app shows i am looking south again i am looking at east the app sometimes showed that i am looking at north or a random direction....  Please fix!
title: Doesn't work

author: Antony Mouse
comment: Force closes on the Moto 360. Does not work at all. Also, please consider changing the voice command, in English google now always interprets 'wear' as 'where', making it impossible to open apps with 'wear' in the title by voice.
title: Moto 360

author: Mark Jamieson
comment: Just crashes on Moto 360.
title: Does nt work Moto 360

author: Tomi
comment: The compass app that comes with the LG G WATCH is more functional. It is okay for a first attempt. I like the design though !
title: Could be better.

author: Shane Hastings
comment: Force closes on G Watch R and Moto 360. Looks like it isn't optimised as the main activity still has "Hello Round World!", whichcan be seen shortly before it crashes.
title: Not optimised for round devices

author: bryan kestle
comment: Only getting hello round world on the watch face Huawei watch with a Sony Xperia z3 phone. I've restarted the watch and the phone and sink apps, the app shows on the watch but nothing happens except hello round world
title: "hello round world"

author: Michael Oberle
comment: The East West pointer seems to be operating in Reverse. When  facing north it is correct. When facing south it is correct. When facing west the pointer indicates East. Could just be the Sony.
title: Simple but backward on Sony SW3

author: Nicholas E. Gilkes
comment: Why is this not compatible with round watches? Simply ridiculous self-inflicted stupidity.

author: Daniel Upstone
comment: Just compared this to the Samsung Gear Live's default one, and it's reporting as SW, while the Samsung Gear Live one is reporting as SE, so it appears to be calibrated incorrectly.
title: Inaccurate

author: Ahmad Bouman Ali
comment: I have motor360 and each time when I try to use the app it's stops before anything come up.
title: No working!

author: Sam Sussman
comment: The app only crashes on moto 360... After installing this my device would read as disconnected and search/voice would fail until I restarted the device and toggled the connection from my tablet.
title: Crashed on moto 360

author: Rodney T.
comment: Instant force close on launch
title: Not Compatible with Moto 360

author: Jos van Baal
comment: Developers don't respond to messages.
title: Doesnt work on round screens

author: Desirae M
comment: Found it in the menu part of the watch. Didn't have to verbally ask it to open. Works great.
title: Works on sony smartwatch 3

author: James Chen
comment: Does not work for moto 360. Will change stars.
title: Moto 360

author: Keven Jeffery
comment: Doesn't work on Moto 360
title: Moto 360 - No

comment: Crashes on LG G Watch R.
title: Not working

author: Jared Leith
comment: Does not work on my LG R

author: JEFFREY OAKS
comment: Doesn't work on moto 360. :(
title: Doesn't work

author: Peter Nam
comment: Broke on Moto 360. Please fix.
title: Broke on Moto 360

author: Tomas D.
comment: A+ free App that does not need any special permissions. Works as advertised.
title: Works great on Gear Live!

author: Kunashe Mutabeni
comment: It does not work useless

author: Kim Steele
comment: Instant crash on g watch r
title: Instant crash on g watch r

author: Luke Gordon
comment: It literally just says "hello round world" they ain't even no compass
title: It is predurik af

author: krishna aditya
comment: Stupid app.
title: Fooling people

author: Josh Broussard
comment: Crashes on launch: Moto 360
title: Crashes

author: Danny White
comment: Voice controls on mine always yield "Open where compass" which just launches the stock compass. Consider changing your otherwise awesome compass' name!

author: Nate Hancock
comment: Cant wait to use it though.
title: Force close on moto360

author: Greg Barrett
comment: Guess he's not fixing it for the 360. It's been weeks now.
title: force closing on moto 360

author: Ethan Stacey
comment: Crashes on startup moto 360

author: Rob Ban
comment: Black background instead of white. Would also like the ability to toggle GPS coords.
title: Options?

author: Rohit Beri
comment: Crashes on moto 360…

author: KKK Ko
comment: Cannot startup at LG G Watch R
title: Cannot startup at LG G Watch R
